definition: essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)
Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods
can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy
tree trunk/main part of sth/to manage/to work/to do/capable/cadre/to kill (slang)/to fuck (vulgar)

sentences.english: He is a lewd of a dandy, but admits skill, shrewd.
sentences.chinese: 他固然是个好色的纨绔子弟，但身手矫捷，精明能干。

sentences.english: You deserve to marry a capable and intelligent guy like me.
sentences.chinese: 你就该嫁给一个像我这样精明能干的人。

sentences.english: Doris has really got a good head on her shoulders.
sentences.chinese: 多利斯精明能干，我想她一定能做一名好经理。

sentences.english: She had always struck him as so poised, so competent.
sentences.chinese: 她给他的印象是如此的镇定自若，精明能干。

sentences.english: A good leader should be both competent and efficient.
sentences.chinese: 一名好领导应该精明能干，办事效率高。

sentences.english: The longer I lived in London, the savvier I felt.
sentences.chinese: 我在伦敦生活的时间越长，就越觉得自己精明能干。

sentences.english: I'm sure one of your gifts is the gift of a smart and capable brain.
sentences.chinese: 我确信你们的天赋之一就是拥有精明能干的头脑。

definition: be smooth and slick (in establishing social relations)
can talk really well (idiom); the gift of the gab
